articles.title: Gold prices today fall sharply, down ₹6000 from record highs; silver slumps - Mint
articles.description: Apart from US election results, gold investors are also awaiting the outcome of Federal Reserve and Bank of England meetings this week.Gold prices in India are still up about 30% so far this year despite trading in a narrow range over past few weeks

articles.description: Among brokerages, Morgan Stanley and Nomura were bullish on Sun Pharma after the company reported its September quarter results while CLSA and Nomura maintained 'buy' calls on Adani Ports on Q2 results.Get latest Market online at cnbctv18.com

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Oil climbs as U.S. stockpiles shrink, but election uncertainty overshadows market - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. oil prices jumped more than 2% on Wednesday after industry data showed crude inventories in the United States dropped sharply and as investors awaited results from the tumultuous presidential election.
